oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter to William Thurman of Gibsonville (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written by Thurman's "dearest and best friend" Robert Willeohan(" from Texas, this prewar letter discusses some political news of the coming crisis and relates farm prices in Texas. Correspondent appears to have been a close friend and neighbor who has emigrated from Tennessee to Texas.
